meanings.definition: Kimchees (noun): plural form of kimchee, a Korean dish made of fermented vegetables.
meanings.sent1: At the party, we enjoyed various kimchees with our meal.
meanings.sent2: The kimchees added a spicy kick to the meal.
meanings.sent3: The kimchees danced on our taste buds with their tangy flavors.
meanings.sent4: The fridge was a colorful garden of kimchees waiting to be savored.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of kimchees filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: Kimchees (verb): third person singular present of kimchee, to prepare or eat kimchee.
meanings.sent1: She kimchees her meal every evening before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He kimchees his kimchee with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: The chef kimchees the kimchee with a secret recipe.
meanings.sent4: The family eagerly watches as she kimchees the kimchee for the feast.
meanings.sent5: In the kitchen, the delightful smell of kimchees being kimcheed wafts through the air.

meanings.definition: Kimchees (adjective): describing something related to or resembling kimchee.
meanings.sent1: The kimchees flavors were evident in the dish.
meanings.sent2: She loved the kimchees taste of the soup.
meanings.sent3: The kimchees colors of the garden vegetables brightened the salad.
meanings.sent4: The kimchees aroma of the kitchen brought back memories of Korea.
meanings.sent5: The kimchees texture of the dish was both crunchy and satisfying.
